description:
Yamaguchi Mami is a member of the newspaper team, and http://anidb.net/ch1203 [Minako]`s sometimes irreverent petite sœur. However, like Minako, Mami herself is also always looking for the latest scoop. Mami also sometimes finds herself being the one to rein in Minako`s hyperactive tendencies to run amok. But on the other hand, Minako often wishes that Mami wouldn`t be so serious all the time, resulting in a rather unorthodox mix of sœurs.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Yamaguchi Mami
